sentences.en: arithmetic had never been my strong point.
sentences.cn: 算术从来不是我的强项。

sentences.en: As she went past there was a gust of strong perfume.
sentences.cn: 她走过时有一股浓烈的香水味。

sentences.en: During the turmoil in the foreign-exchange markets the guilder remained strong.
sentences.cn: 荷兰盾在外汇交易市场的动荡中保持坚挺。

sentences.en: he came on strong towards the end of the round.
sentences.cn: 在该回合结束时他的状态大幅回升。

sentences.en: He had a strong sense of responsibility to his vocation of preaching.
sentences.cn: 他对自己的布道使命有强烈的责任感。

sentences.en: He is known for his political savvy and strong management skills.
sentences.cn: 他以睿智的政治头脑和强势的管理手腕出名。

sentences.en: he is strong on comedy.
sentences.cn: 他擅长喜剧。

sentences.en: He was a big strong man.
sentences.cn: 他高大健壮。

sentences.en: His 50 years of experience have given him strong convictions about style.
sentences.cn: 50年的经验使得他在款式上有自己的独到见解。

sentences.en: I had a strong desire to help and care for people.
sentences.cn: 我非常渴望能够帮助和照顾他人。

sentences.en: I’m not strong enough to fight him.
sentences.cn: 和他打我还不够强壮。

sentences.en: Jack was tall and strong.
sentences.cn: 杰克又高又壮。

sentences.en: Many viewers have strong opinions about violence on the screen.
sentences.cn: 许多观众对银幕暴力心存反感。

sentences.en: She was a fairly rigid person who had strong religious views.
sentences.cn: 她相当顽固，宗教观念极强。

sentences.en: She's calm and strong, and she is just not going to crack.
sentences.cn: 她镇定而且坚强，绝不会垮掉。

sentences.en: She's going to be fine. She always was pretty strong.
sentences.cn: 她会好的。她一直都很强壮。

sentences.en: Strong winds can turn boats when the tide is weak.
sentences.cn: 潮水小的时候强风可以让船只改变航向。

sentences.en: the programme is still going strong after twelve series.
sentences.cn: 播出12个系列后，该节目仍然很受欢迎。

sentences.en: The rescuers were beaten back by strong winds and currents.
sentences.cn: 救援人员因风浪太大而被迫中断工作。

sentences.en: The US dollar continued its strong performance in Tokyo today.
sentences.cn: 美元今天在东京继续保持强劲的走势。

sentences.en: There are strong signs that his views are gaining ground.
sentences.cn: 各种明显的迹象显示他的观点越来越受欢迎。

sentences.en: There is often a strong accent on material success.
sentences.cn: 经常大力强调物质成就。

sentences.en: There is the strong possibility that such cooperation will prove unworkable.
sentences.cn: 这种合作很有可能会行不通。

words.tran_cn: 强有力地；坚强地；激烈地；气味浓地

phrases.phrase: come on strong informal 非正式
phrases.tran_cn: 大幅度地改善状况（地位）
(非正式)保持健康，保持精力充沛，保持兴旺，保持运行良好
对…特别偏爱的，特别注重…的
强劲增长；强劲的增长势头
看涨的行情；坚挺的市场价格
支撑点，坚固支撑点；强项；据点
坚强的意志；强烈意愿；战胜自我

trans.tran_cn: 强的，坚强的，强烈的，强壮的
trans.tran_en: having a lot of physical power so that you can lift heavy things, do hard physical work etc
having a lot of physical power so that you can lift heavy things, do hard physical work etc
